    • newMatrix

      public void newMatrix(Level level, int dimx, int dimy, int minesNumber)
      Restart the matrix for a new online game
      Parameters:
      level - level of the game
      dimx - dimension x (width) of the grid
      dimy - dimension y (height) of the grid
      minesNumber - number of mines in the game

      Parameters:

      x - position x of the first case
      y - position y of the first case
